About Us

We're a group of people, mostly based in the Washington, DC area, fighting to free the world from the bonds of smartphone addiction.

Our Members

Erik Boesen

Erik is a photographer, web designer, and guitarist, in no particular order. He founded Project Vib in 2016.

Simon Lundquist

Simon is a filmographer and director who has made over 50 short films.
